main event: An unidentified aerial object was observed by an F-82 aircraft from the 339th Fighter Squadron at Misawa Air Base, Japan, on February 1, 1951.
interesting points: The object was silvery, circular, and approximately the size of a C-47 airplane.,The object performed several 360-degree turns at high speed.,The pilot reported the object after leveling off at 6000 feet.,Weather conditions were clear with no unusual phenomena reported before the sighting.,No positive identification of the object was ever established, and radar did not detect it.
witness description: F-82 aircraft pilot and radar observer
